DOC.brief_title: Induced ACL Healing With Ligamys Technique : Prospective , Multicenter Observational Case Series
DOC.detailed_description: The Ligamys method successfully apply animal study include eleven white alpine sheep . Healing torn ACL stable joint without sign intra-articular damage osteoarthritis three month postoperative observe ( Kohl KSSTA 2013 ) . In first clinical study ten patient , Ligamys surgical technique result stable clinical radiological healing torn ACL nine patient one re-rupture four month . Nine patient obtain normal knee score , report excellent patient satisfaction , could return previous level sport activity ( Kohl Swiss Med Wkly 2011 ) . The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness Ligamys technique treatment acute rupture anterior cruciate ligament multicenter routine clinical setting . To conduct long-term follow-up case series post-market product surveillance endeavor .
